p: Preparation of feeder cells. Peritoneal macrophages (PM) were used as feeder cells, after being obtained according to a previously published protocol ( 13). Briefly, Kunming mice were intraperitoneally injected with 5 mL of thioglycolate. The peritoneal exudate was collected after 72 h and diluted in DMEM containing 10% FBS. Cells at density of 10 5 cells/100 Î¼L were transferred into 96-well plates for 2 h. After removal of non-adherent cells, the medium was replaced, and the remaining cells were cultured for five days in the atmosphere with 5% CO 2.
